A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Nice visuals\, shit story. Also takes a huge dump on the universe that fans cared about.. 
Questions unanswered or total cop out(Snoke\, Rey's parents).
New characters never developed.. Story lacks universal values (no need to learn anything\, no need to struggle or work hard\, even if you fail your mission you can luck out and find someone else to do the job..no consequences)
Old characters disrespected.. Not consistent with their actions in previous movies.. Seriously Luke didn't give up on the most evil characters ever but gave up on his nephew?
Don't think Disney understands what ppl love about star wars..
